formalpara.title: if you are using bash — run even simply

para.programlisting:
wget https://github.com/daggerok/streaming-file-server/releases/download/3.4.9/file-items-service-3.4.9.jar bash file-items-service-3.4.9.jar
wget https://github.com/daggerok/streaming-file-server/releases/download/3.4.9/file-server-3.4.9.jar bash file-server-3.4.9.jar --app.upload.path=./path/to/file-storage
